definition[0]: a note written at the end of a letter, adding more information
example[0]: She added a PS to say ‘hi’ to my brother.
example[1]: Best wishes, Julie. PS Maggie sends her love.
definition[1]: written abbreviation for POSTSCRIPT; written at the end of a letter when you want to add more information. You can add PPS if more information comes after the PS
example[2]: She added a PS asking me to send her some money.
example[3]: Best wishes, Julie. PS If Thursday is not convenient, let me know. PPS You can reach me on email at the address below.
